page.title: 02Recreation in our area
page.content: OUTDOOR The beaches around the area offer many facilities for family enjoyment, including swimming, wind-surfing, canoeing and seafishing. The beaches are sandy and safe and include Monkstone, Rushy Lake, Waterwynch and Northbeach Tenby. There are lovely woodland and nature walks at Rushy Lake, Trevayne, Monkstone, Waterwynch, Allens View and Scotsborough woods. During the summer months a fun fair is held at Twy Cross, also a small weekly market, selling clothing linen, toys and goods. Many hotels and caravan sites offer summertime entertainment. The biggest of which is Park House Hotel. For further information see Modern Recreation Complex. 1
